title: RIP...
body: So I'm from NA and tried logging on only to find out I was no longer on NA, but on EU West. I may have accidently switched some how, or been hacked. I've contacted Riot multiple times trying to explain the situation but have never got a reply (also the account was made in 2014 so I forgot the email and the password to the email I made it to). Is there a way to pay for riot points (to get it back to NA), that now require euros, when all I have is USDs?

replies.body:
It looks like you successfully submitted a ticket about this today. An account specialist should get back to you soon in order to sort this out.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Yeah I do have a question, how long is it going to take, because I've submitted multiple tickets multiple times and got no support on the matter. Also I really think you guys should invest in an actual live chat or number to call for support, I'm pretty sure riot makes enough money. I know for a fact they have from me.

I can't provide an ETA on when you'll see a reply on your ticket, since that largely depends on how many tickets were submitted recently. If you run into issues with getting a reply this time around, let me know.
